card.name: Accumulated Knowledge
text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
flavor: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."
—Takara, to Eladamri

card.name: Act of Heroism
text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor: "On every plane, there are those who run toward danger."
—Gideon Jura

card.name: Act of Treason
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Ainok Survivalist
text: {i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.){/i}
When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
text: Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered.
Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue
: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
flavor: "Wrath is no vice when inflicted upon the deserving."

card.name: Akroma's Vengeance
text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
flavor: "Many must die for the one who should not have perished."

card.name: Ambassador Oak
text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

card.name: Ancient Craving
text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor: Knowledge demands sacrifice.

card.name: Ancient Stirrings
text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{i}(Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.){/i}

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic

card.name: Angelic Page
text: : Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

card.name: Animar, Soul of Elements
text: Protection from white and from black
Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements.
less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

card.name: Arcane Denial
text: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Ash Barrens
text: {i}(, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.){/i}

card.name: Assembly-Worker
text: : Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: With their factories long destroyed, some of Mishra's creations still toil in remote areas, endlessly performing and reperforming their last orders.

card.name: Auramancer
text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

card.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
text: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.
flavor: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

card.name: Balduvian Horde
text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
flavor: "We earn no medals and fight for no titles. Blood is proof of our victory."
—Lovisa Coldeyes

allSets.name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

card.name: Ball Lightning
text: {i}(This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.){/i}
{i}(This creature can attack and as soon as it comes under your control.){/i}
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.
flavor: The most frightening storms are those not woven by nature's hand.

card.name: Baloth Null
text: When Baloth Null enters the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Humans use pigs to hunt for mushrooms, don't they? It's like that."
—Harak, Malakir bloodwitch

card.name: Bident of Thassa
text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.
flavor: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

card.name: Blightning
text: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player. That player discards two cards.
flavor: While the smell of burning flesh is common in Grixis, the odor of smoldering brain matter is a rare treat.

card.name: Bloodhunter Bat
text: When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

card.name: Blue Elemental Blast
flavor: Nothing escapes a sharp mind.

card.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it."
—Pelyus, vedalken ordinar

card.name: Boros Charm
text: • Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player.
• Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
• Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Borrowing 100,000 Arrows
text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.

card.name: Brainstorm
text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Brine Elemental
text: {i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips his or her next untap step.
flavor: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

card.name: Brion Stoutarm
text: , Sacrifice another creature: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player.
flavor: Boggarts and disturbing bits of boggarts flew through the air with alarming and untidy regularity.

card.name: Broodhatch Nantuko
text: Whenever Broodhatch Nantuko is dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}

allSets.name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

card.name: Browbeat
text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
flavor: "Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
flavor: Travelers bathe in the falls to wash away curses from the pucas who lurk nearby.

card.name: Caustic Tar
flavor: The spite of the Cabal turns meadow into mire.

card.name: Chalice of the Void
text: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
text: : Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{i}(, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.){/i}

card.name: Choking Tethers
text: Tap up to four target creatures.
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
When you cycle Choking Tethers, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Cinder Storm
text: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Any pyromancer can summon fire with a thought. The trick is putting it out.

card.name: Cloudblazer
text: When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.
flavor: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

card.name: Cloudshift
text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: "Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."
—Elder Rimheit

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

card.name: Coalition Relic
text: : Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
flavor: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

card.name: Conflux
text: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: After years of world-bending machinations, Bolas's triumph is at hand.

card.name: Congregate
text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
flavor: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—Song of All, canto 642

card.name: Coralhelm Guide
text: : Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."
—Jori En, expedition leader

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Courser of Kruphix
text: Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Court Hussar
text: When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless

card.name: Crimson Mage
text: : Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: "We wield the fires of rage. War is our blood and destruction our birthright."
—Crimson creed

card.name: Cultivate
text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

card.name: Curiosity
text: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

card.name: Cursecatcher
text: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays
flavor: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."

card.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor: "With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive."
—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition
Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic

card.name: Dauntless Cathar
text: , Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."

card.name: Deadly Designs
text: : Put a plot counter on Deadly Designs. Any player may activate this ability.
When there are five or more plot counters on Deadly Designs, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy up to two target creatures.

card.name: Death's-Head Buzzard
text: When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Infested with vermin, ever hungering, dropping from night's sky.

card.name: Decree of Justice
text: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay
. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Dirge of Dread
text: All creatures gain fear until end of turn.
{i}(They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.){/i}
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
When you cycle Dirge of Dread, you may have target creature gain fear until end of turn.

card.name: Disenchant
flavor: "The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever."
—Song of All, canto 881

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis

card.name: Disfigure
text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

card.name: Doomsday
text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Dragon's Eye Savants
text: Morph—Reveal a blue card in your hand.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
text: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Echoing Courage
text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

card.name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor: Xenagos reveled while Theros burned.

card.name: Eladamri's Call
text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: Tribal rivalries and petty disputes were laid aside at Eladamri's summons.

card.name: Elvish Aberration
text: {i}(, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.){/i}

card.name: Elvish Piper
text: : You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more.
—Elvish teaching

card.name: Ember Weaver
text: {i}(This creature can block creatures with flying.){/i}
As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
flavor: "Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky."
—Sunseeder myth

card.name: Ensnaring Bridge
text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
flavor: "When I said I needed a hand, I didn't mean this."
—Gerrard Capashen

card.name: Enthralling Victor
text: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.

card.name: Epic Confrontation
text: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.
{i}(Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.){/i}
flavor: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

card.name: Erg Raiders
text: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.
flavor: Their skills are extensive, and their appetite for battle just as vast.

card.name: Exclude
flavor: "Terrifying, but thankfully temporary."
—Teferi

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic

card.name: Fallen Angel
text: Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Fathom Seer
text: Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

card.name: Fencing Ace
text: {i}(This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.){/i}
flavor: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

card.name: Fetid Heath
flavor: "Do not linger in such places, child. There the gwyllions dance. If they find you, you will join in their revels for eternity."
—Talara, elvish safewright

card.name: Fiend Hunter
text: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.
When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Fierce Empath
text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Flash
text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to
flavor: No tactic transforms a battle like a well-timed carnivore.

card.name: Flooded Grove
flavor: At full moon, the river seeps over its banks and crawls through the woods like a blanket of serpents.

card.name: Fortune Thief
text: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}

card.name: Freed from the Real
flavor: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.

card.name: Frenzied Goblin
text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay
. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

card.name: Geist of the Moors
flavor: "The battle is won. There's work to be done. / The Blessed Sleep must wait. / A fiend is about. It stalks the devout. / I'll save them from my fate."
—"The Good Geist's Vow"

card.name: Genju of the Falls
text: : Enchanted Island becomes a 3/2 blue Spirit creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.
When enchanted Island is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Falls from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Genju of the Spires
text: : Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Spires from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ghost Ship
flavor: Going down with the ship is just the beginning.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins
Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana

card.name: Giant Growth
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "Only the most effective tactics stand the test of time."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

card.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
text: If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.
If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

card.name: Goblin War Drums
text: {i}(They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.){/i}
flavor: Their eardrums may have given out, but the rest of them never will.

card.name: Gods Willing
text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1.
{i}(Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.){/i}
flavor: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

card.name: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden
text: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Griffin Protector
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

card.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
text: : Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

card.name: Haunted Fengraf
text: , Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: A ghoulcaller's playground.

card.name: Heavy Arbalest
text: Equipped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Hell's Caretaker
text: , Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
flavor: "The rules are clear. If you want to leave, you need only convince another to take your place."

card.name: Hordeling Outburst
text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor: "Leave no scraps, lest you attract pests."
—Mardu threat

card.name: Horror of the Broken Lands
text: Whenever you cycle or discard another card, Horror of the Broken Lands gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
flavor: It feeds on dry bones in the sand and desperate pleas in the wind.

card.name: Horseshoe Crab
flavor: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

card.name: Humble Defector
text: : Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate this ability only during your turn.
flavor: "You were once Mardu, so your body and will are strong. Now we must train your mind."
—Houn, Jeskai elder

card.name: Ihsan's Shade
flavor: No mortal could atone for Ihsan's betrayal. Redemption required him to become something else.

card.name: Imperial Recruiter
text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: A passionate recruiter will win a war before the first arrow flies.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana

card.name: Invigorate
text: If you control a Forest, rather than pay Invigorate's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life.
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Ire Shaman
text: {i}(This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.){/i}
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.){/i}
When Ire Shaman is turned face up, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Iwamori of the Open Fist
text: When Iwamori of the Open Fist enters the battlefield, each opponent may put a legendary creature card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Izzet Chemister
text: : Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
text: +2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

allSets.name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

card.name: Jackal Pup
text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
flavor: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

card.name: Jalira, Master Polymorphist
text: , Sacrifice another creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor: "You can become anything if I just put my mind to it."

card.name: Karona's Zealot
text: {i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

card.name: Kavu Climber
text: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: The kavu might be above you
—Llanowar expression meaning
"keep an open mind"

card.name: Kavu Predator
text: Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.
flavor: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

card.name: Kindle
text: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
flavor: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

card.name: Knight of the Skyward Eye
text: : Knight of the Skyward Eye gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: The Order of the Skyward Eye does the bidding of an evil force, unwittingly stirring fear and mistrust across Bant in accordance with his plans.

card.name: Kongming, "Sleeping Dragon"
flavor: "Such a lord as this—all virtues' height—
Had never been, nor ever was again."

card.name: Kor Firewalker
text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
flavor: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

card.name: Krosan Colossus
text: {i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
flavor: When it walked, it altered geography. When it bellowed, it changed the weather.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana

card.name: Krosan Tusker
text: {i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Laquatus's Champion
text: When Laquatus's Champion enters the battlefield, target player loses 6 life.
When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life.
flavor: Chainer's dark gift to a darker soul.

allSets.name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

card.name: Lightning Bolt
text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

card.name: Living Death
text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Living Wish
text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.
flavor: The best wishes include the will to tame their consequences.

card.name: Lorescale Coatl
text: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.
flavor: "The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales."
—Ranalus, vedalken heretic

card.name: Loyal Sentry
text: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.
flavor: His watch ends only when he does.

card.name: Lull
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
flavor: The clamor of war ceased as both armies stood and marveled at the beauty of Gaea's work.

card.name: Luminarch Ascension
text: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Luminarch Ascension.
: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

card.name: Lunarch Mantle
text: , Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains flying until end of turn."
flavor: "A boon from the angels should never be cast aside."
—Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor

card.name: Magus of the Wheel
text: , Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.
flavor: "Fate is not as fixed as you might think."

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Man-o'-War
text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

card.name: Master of the Wild Hunt
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.

card.name: Merfolk Looter
text: : Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

card.name: Mesmeric Fiend
text: When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
flavor: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed."
—Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

card.name: Mishra's Factory
text: : Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

allSets.name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

card.name: Murder
flavor: "No matter how busy my schedule gets, I always try to take time for that personal touch."
—Queen Marchesa

card.name: Murder of Crows
text: Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.

card.name: Myriad Landscape
text: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped.
, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mystic of the Hidden Way
text: Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
flavor: "There are no obstacles, only different paths."

card.name: Mystic Snake
text: When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.
flavor: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

card.name: Nettle Sentinel
text: Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.
flavor: Though Shadowmoor's monster-haunted wilds beckon, she never leaves her post.

card.name: Nezumi Cutthroat
text: {i}(This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.){/i}
flavor: "The nezumi will do things for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

card.name: Nicol Bolas
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay
Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.
flavor: Dominaria's most ancient evil.

card.name: Nihil Spellbomb
text: , Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay
. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
text: Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Noble Templar
text: {i}(, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.){/i}

card.name: Notion Thief
text: If an opponent would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in each of his or her draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Nyx-Fleece Ram
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.
flavor: The gods are fascinated by innocence, perhaps because it's a quality they themselves lack.

card.name: Ordeal of Heliod
text: Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic

card.name: Pacifism
text: Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

card.name: Pact of Negation
text: At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay
. If you don't, you lose the game.
flavor: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

card.name: Path of Peace
text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor: As Hedrax stepped into oblivion, he welcomed the unwavering silence.

card.name: Pendelhaven
text: : Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

card.name: Perilous Myr
text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

card.name: Pernicious Deed
text: , Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
flavor: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

card.name: Phantasmal Bear
text: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all."
—Pol Jamaar, illusionist

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

card.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

card.name: Phyrexian Obliterator
text: Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.
flavor: "Behold blessed perfection."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

allSets.name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

card.name: Pillage
text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "The embers of our homes still smolder, and already the villages of Kjeldor burn in retaliation. What they have started, we will finish."
—Lovisa Coldeyes

card.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
text: Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."
flavor: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

card.name: Plague Wind
text: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.
flavor: "The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy."
—Keld Triumphant

card.name: Plummet
flavor: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

card.name: Presence of Gond
text: : Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."
flavor: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

card.name: Primal Clay
text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types.

card.name: Promise of Bunrei
text: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.
flavor: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

card.name: Prophetic Prism
text: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.
: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

card.name: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher
text: When you cast Prossh, Skyraider of Kher, create X 0/1 red Kobold creature tokens named Kobolds of Kher Keep, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Prossh.
Sacrifice another creature: Prossh gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Protean Hulk
text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: "Meat and eggs. We eat!"
—Borborygmos

card.name: Pyre Hound
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Pyre Hound.
flavor: Its growl is the crackling and popping of a wildfire untamed.

card.name: Pyroclasm
text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Quicksand
text: , Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.
flavor: Not all deaths are etched with mythic meaning and iconic glory.

card.name: Quicksilver Dagger
text: : This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."
flavor: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana

card.name: Rancor
text: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.
flavor: Hatred outlives the hateful.

card.name: Ratcatcher
text: {i}(This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.){/i}
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Rat card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: An ogre's poisonous stench is like fine Kashkaval cheese to the noses lowest to the ground.

card.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
flavor: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

card.name: Red Elemental Blast
flavor: Nothing restrains a burning passion.

card.name: Reef Worm
text: When Reef Worm dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with ‘When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"

card.name: Regrowth
text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Relentless Rats
text: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

card.name: Renewed Faith
text: {i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
When you cycle Renewed Faith, you may gain 2 life.
flavor: Skepticism fades in the face of the miraculous.

card.name: Rest in Peace
text: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
flavor: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.

card.name: Retraction Helix
text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "
: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."
flavor: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.

card.name: Returned Phalanx
text: : Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.

card.name: Rishadan Port
flavor: Rishada is the gateway to free trade—but the key will cost you.

card.name: Rugged Prairie
flavor: Hobs bury their kin far from home. They believe the dry, open ground keeps hags from stealing the bones and gwyllions from stealing the spirits.

card.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
text: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able.
Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

card.name: Ruthless Ripper
text: Morph—Reveal a black card in your hand.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
When Ruthless Ripper is turned face up, target player loses 2 life.

card.name: Sai of the Shinobi
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Sai of the Shinobi to it.
flavor: The passing of the sai presages the end of the old clan and the ascent of the new.

card.name: Savannah Lions
flavor: "One alone is fearsome; one among many is unstoppable."
—Benalish proverb

card.name: Self-Assembler
text: When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: It sees itself in all of its creations.

card.name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
text: {i}(This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.){/i}
Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Shoreline Ranger
text: {i}(, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.){/i}

card.name: Sift
text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor: "Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."
—Karn, silver golem

card.name: Simian Spirit Guide
text: Exile Simian Spirit Guide from your hand: Add
flavor: "It's rarely worth questioning where the mana comes from. Just be grateful."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Skeletonize
text: Skeletonize deals 3 damage to target creature. When a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with "
flavor: Fire burns away both flesh and freedom.

card.name: Skirk Commando
text: Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls.
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Soulbright Flamekin
text: : Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add
flavor: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

card.name: Spikeshot Goblin
text: : Spikeshot Goblin deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
flavor: "Proximity discouraged. Do not approach."
—Vulshok field guide

card.name: Squadron Hawk
text: When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Stampede Driver
text: , Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

card.name: Stangg
text: When Stangg enters the battlefield, create a legendary 3/4 red and green Human Warrior creature token named Stangg Twin. Exile that token when Stangg leaves the battlefield. Sacrifice Stangg when that token leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Street Wraith
text: {i}(This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.){/i}
{i}(Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
flavor: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

card.name: Strionic Resonator
text: : Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
{i}(A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at."){/i}
flavor: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.

card.name: Summoner's Pact
text: Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay
. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Sundering Titan
text: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.
flavor: "Even if we defeat it, what remains to be saved?"
—Glissa Sunseeker

card.name: Supernatural Stamina
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor: "All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."
—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
text: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.
flavor: "There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat . . . if you're prepared."
—Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
flavor: "Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde."

card.name: Thresher Lizard
text: Thresher Lizard gets +1/+2 as long as you have one or fewer cards in hand.
flavor: The sound of its plated tail beating on desert rocks is often mistaken for the footfalls of a much larger predator.

card.name: Timberpack Wolf
text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.
flavor: "The need for the pack is bred in their bones. Their true strength will not show itself for any other purpose."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Totally Lost
text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor: Fblthp had always hated crowds.

card.name: Treasure Keeper
text: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Tree of Redemption
text: : Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness.
flavor: The executioner's tree in Thraben Cathedral holds the power to absolve more than the souls of the hanged.

card.name: Triskaidekaphobia
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —
• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player gains 1 life.
• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

card.name: Twilight Mire
flavor: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana

card.name: Twisted Abomination
text: {i}(, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.){/i}

card.name: Twisted Image
text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor: "True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form."
—Politus, vedalken emisar

card.name: Uncaged Fury
text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.
{i}(It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.){/i}
flavor: "It's right to fear those that you keep locked away."
—Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

card.name: Undead Gladiator
text: , Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
flavor: The Cabal loves encores.

card.name: Unearth
text: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{i}(, Discard this card: Draw a card.){/i}
flavor: No matter how deep you bury it, some evil refuses to stay dead.

card.name: Urbis Protector
text: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor: "Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves."
—Vennick of the Gateless

card.name: Utopia Sprawl
text: As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of the chosen color to his or her mana pool
{i}(in addition to the mana the land produces){/i}

card.name: Valor in Akros
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.
flavor: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

card.name: Vendilion Clique
text: When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

card.name: Vessel of Nascency
text: , Sacrifice Vessel of Nascency: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
text: As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down."
{i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}

card.name: Watchwolf
flavor: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

card.name: Whitemane Lion
text: {i}(You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.){/i}
When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

card.name: Wildheart Invoker
text: : Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—The Invokers' Tales

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Willbender
text: {i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
text: {i}(This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.){/i}
{i}(The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.){/i}
flavor: "On dark nights you can still see the light of the Vess girl's lantern out in the Caligo, seeking her lost brother. Those who follow are doomed to join her endless search."
—"The Fall of the House of Vess"

card.name: Woolly Loxodon
text: {i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
flavor: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

card.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.
flavor: "A hedron holds magic for a thousand years—or less, if need be."

card.name: Zoetic Cavern
text: {i}(You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.){/i}
flavor: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.

card.name: Zombify
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."
—Mystic elder

card.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now that's dangerous."
